humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: According to the pathology report, the sentinel lymph node (A. Sentinel lymph node #1, left axilla) is negative for tumor (0/1). Additionally, the left breast lumpectomy shows invasive ductal carcinoma but no axillary lymph nodes are positive for tumor. Based on the rules provided, the N stage for this patient is N0, as there are no metastatic carcinomas in the sentinel lymph nodes and regional lymph nodes.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report indicates that the sentinel lymph node (SLN) was negative for tumor (0/1). Additionally, there is no mention of non-sentinel lymph node involvement. Therefore, the pathologic N stage for this patient is N0.
